mapper.select: SELECT IDX, TITLE, IMG1 FROM PROJECT_TB WHERE ID = #{id} AND STATUS = 'PJT03'

SELECT P.* , C.CATEGORY_NM , FORMAT(p.TARGET_AMT, 0) AS COMMA_AMT , FORMAT((p.TARGET_AMT * 0.05), 0) AS FEE , FORMAT((p.TARGET_AMT - (p.TARGET_AMT * 0.05)), 0) AS TOTAL_AMT FROM PROJECT_TB P JOIN CATEGORY_TB C ON P.CATEGORY = C.CATEGORY_CD WHERE P.IDX = #{idx}
